data.text: @Almondcookie7 @DanielTetsuyama It is possible to both disagree with mask mandates and be empathetic to peoples suffering despite what your masters tell you.
@mbarreto75 @DanielTetsuyama Nah, you are taking the thinly veiled opportunity to bash NYT, and you are using peoples desperation  to boast your political view. We see you. Just stop.

@Almondcookie7 @DanielTetsuyama I never said that war and disease aren’t terrifying. I am empathizing with people who aren’t wearing masks because they are running for their lives and not shaming them like this article is. THAT is what pushing an agenda looks like. So take your “privilege”slander elsewhere.
@DanielTetsuyama I wonder if the Russians made sure to mask up before they started invading…
@DanielTetsuyama Mom: you can’t go play war with your friends if you don’t put your mask on.

@ShadowfaxCNFT @DanielTetsuyama Dam again sorry for your loss, all the people I love are vaccinated so I don't worrie anymore. 

Ps Putting is definitely worse for the health of the ucranian people.

@BrothershipPool @DanielTetsuyama Nope, the vaccine was in development back then. But in the Ukraine most people still aren't vaccinated. Google says only 34.5% are so I think they may take a hit from covid.
@ShadowfaxCNFT @DanielTetsuyama I am sorry for your loss, where they vaccinated ?
